item.title: The simplest Antarctica Map with Leaflet
item.description: I recently needed to show simple lat/lon points on a web map of Antarctica. While putting a (point) marker on a map is super easy, we also need a basemap (background) to give this point some context. In this case, it came with a couple of challenges: Leaflet normally displays maps using the Google Mercator projection (aka EPSG:3857), but it terribly distorts area near the poles, making Antarctica appears as a wide band at the bottom of the map.
